title: Hewlett Packard Enterprise iLO Amplifier Pack backup  Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Hewlett Packard Enterprise iLO Amplifier Pack. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the backup endpoint. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Hewlett Packard Enterprise has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.hpe.com/hpesc/public/docDisplay?docLocale=en_US&docId=emr_na-hpesbgn04189en_us
timeline:
2021-07-07 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-11-05 - Coordinated public release of advisory
